name: Ninja Spirit (itch) (KKKyle97)
description:
This game is a simple 2d platformer mobile game made as final year project. It is actually connected to another web application for doctor to monitor children health condition. That is why you can find a "report" function in this game.

This game is connected to an internal server and account is fixed.

To play please login with

username: abc123

password: abcd1234

So sorry that this game doesn't check for multiple login so please do login once at a time. Enjoy :)
